apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Classic Game Emulator
apps.versionDescription: Added new N64 support and bug fixes.
apps.localizedDescription: Delta is a powerful and flexible emulator for iOS devices, supporting multiple classic consoles including Game Boy, Game Boy Advance, NES, SNES, N64, and more.

apps.name: Rewound
apps.subtitle: iPod-style Music Player
apps.versionDescription: Minor release with bug fixes, smoother scrolling, and improved skin support.
apps.localizedDescription: Rewound is a customizable iPod-style music player for iOS. It lets you bring back the classic iPod interface, apply skins, and control your music with a nostalgic design.
